Quickstrike:





Quickstrike slowly opened his eyes. They glowed their curious, baneful 
crimson. His head span for a few seconds, then cleared. He found himself in 
Megatron's empty room. He looked around and picked himself off. He wondered 
how long he was asleep. He looked down on himself and his body was in a a 
fine luster.

He walked out of the room, looking left and right for Megatron. He grinned. 
No limp.

"Boss?" he called.
